description:
Currently when nova use neutronv2 api to operate on neutron, it will take status_code 409 as quota exceed
however, it also might be caused by neutron when there is no IP available in subnet (also error code 409)
find a way to distinguish them would be better
title: Nova will not report a neutron create_port fail with correct reason

comments.content:
Currently when nova use neutronv2 api to operate on neutron, it will take status_code 409 as quota exceed
however, it also might be caused by neutron when there is no IP available in subnet (also error code 409)
find a way to distinguish them would be better
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content:
it's different topic, look at https://review.openstack.org/#/c/62581/
especially patch 6's discussion with Alex might have more info
